articles.title: ‘Minecraft Earth’ will shut down on June 30th - Engadget
articles.description: A little over a year after bringing Minecraft Earth in the US, Microsoft announced this week it will shut down the game later this year.
articles.content: After many great adventures, we’ve made the difficult decision to close down Minecraft Earth in June 2021. We’re so grateful for all your support, and today’s last build includes several adjustments … [+1724 chars]
